titles.title: BRAC resolution
Disapproving the recommendations of the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported Adversely by the Yeas and Nays: 43 - 14.

action.text: Reported adversely by the Committee on Armed Services. H. Rept. 109-243.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 132.

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Readiness.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in House

action.text: Mr. Hunter moved to resolve into the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union.
On motion to resolve into Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union Agreed to by voice vote.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Phil Gingrey to act as Chairman of the Committee.
GENERAL DEBATE - The Committee of the Whole proceeded with two hours of general debate on H.J. Res. 65.
The Committee of the Whole rose informally.
The Committee of the Whole resumed its sitting and continued with general debate on H.J. Res. 65.
The House rose from the Committee of the Whole House on the state of the Union to report H.J. Res. 65.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: On passage Failed by recorded vote: 85 - 324, 1 Present (Roll no. 548).

bill.summary: 9/29/2005--Reported to House without amendment. Disapproves the recommendations of the Defense Base Closure and Realignment Commission as submitted by the President on September 15, 2005.
